## FiletreeBuilderOptions.styles property

Custom styles for the filetree components.

**Signature:**

```typescript
styles?: Partial<FiletreeStyles>;
```

## Remarks

Uses `Style` from `@boba-cli/chapstick` to apply terminal colors and formatting. Partial styles are merged with defaults.
